name: Into the Labyrinth (Gavin O)
description:
This is a horror game called Into the Labyrinth. As your demons haunt you in the mind below lies this hedge maze a manifestation of your subconscious and the demons that hunt you. Can you survive your past trauma? Can you survive the things that lurk in this labyrinth? Do you dare venture Into the Labyrinth?

Credits:

  • Gavin O'Hanlon - Project Manager, Level Design
  • Andrew  Valenzuela - Art, Level Design, Audio Design
  • Ryan  Lloyd - General Dev, Art, Backend Coding
  • Christian Vives - AI Dev, UI Dev, General Gameplay Dev
  • Chris Allen - Consultant
